Feb. 24, 2018 D Valley Entertainment Contest (Championship Brass)
Valley Entertainment Contest (Championship Brass) 1 Entertainments Contest Valley Entertainment Contest valley-entertainment-contest-championship-brass
Valley Hotel, Fivemiletown, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, UK Adjudicators: Alan Morrison for music, Frank Sweeney for entertainment In the event of a tie, music mark takes precedence
Most entertaining band: Laganvale (Metal Technology) Band Best march: 1st Old Boys Association Silver Band Best soloist: James Cooke (soprano cornet, Murley Silver Band)
March 2, 2018, 12:30 p.m. March 2, 2018, 12:38 p.m.
1 Laganvale Band Stephen Crooks
2 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Stephen Cairns
3 Downshire Brass Michael Alcorn
4 Murley Silver Band William Hill
5 Third Carrickfergus Band Brian Connolly
